plentry.pd: The display window for the video (view).
The rendering mode of the video. See .

pd.p:
The channel name, which is a string that must be unique and less than 64 bytes. Supported characters are (89 in total):
All lowercase English letters: a to z.
All uppercase English letters: A to Z.
All numeric characters: 0 to 9.
The space character.
Other symbols: "!"、"#"、"$"、"%"、"&"、"("、")"、"+"、"-"、":"、";"、"<"、"="、"."、">"、"?"、"@"、"["、"]"、"^"、"_"、" {"、"}"、"|"、"~"、","。
The default value is the empty string "". If the user joins the channel through the method of the class, set this parameter to the default value. which means the user's rendering view in the channel.
If the user joins the channel using the method of the class, set this parameter to the channelId of the object. The `VideoCanvas` struct defines the video canvas of the user in the channel with the specified channel ID.

The mirror mode of the view. See .
For the local user:
If the user uses the front camera, the mirror mode is enabled by default.
If the user uses the rear camera, the mirror mode is disabled by default.
For the remote user: The mirror mode is disabled by default.
